name: TIP (17)
description:
The crash occurred in the westbound lanes of a 3-lane roadway with a T-intersection.  Conditions were dark with lights, dry with cloudy skies in the evening on a weekday.  The westbound lanes had a posted speed of 80 kmph (50 mph), the southbound lane had a speed limit of 56 kmph (35 mph).
vehicle1 was a vehicle1 sedan traveling southbound in the right lane approaching a t-intersection with a stop sign. vehicle2, a vehicle2 sedan, was traveling westbound in the right lane approaching the t-intersection. vehicle1 made a left turn at the stop sign and the front of vehicle2 struck the left side of vehicle1 in the westbound lane. both vehicles came to final rest facing westbound.
